channel.title: Security Patch Management on Qian Jia
channel.description: Recent content in Security Patch Management on Qian Jia

item.title: A Dynamic Patching Policy for Enterprise Information Systems
item.description: The present research proposes a novel dynamic patching policy (DPP) to minimize the total system cost.

item.title: Enterprise Security Patch Management with Deep Reinforcement Learning
item.description: This study addresses the patching decision problem by proposing a novel deep reinforcement learning-based approach. Presented in ICIS 2024.
